name: Clearer Stash Diff Highlighting
description:
Increased intensity of colours in diffs for stash/bitbucket from Atlassian.
Also will actually hide PRs on stash when filtering (using the 't' key) rather than just making them opaque.
additional_info:
It's a fairly vague URL pattern so it works on bitbucket and internal stash pages.
This is probably far too intense depending on your monitor setup (e.g. high contrast/saturation, or using something like Samsung Magic Angle in 'Standing Mode').
